I feel like: The last Jedi is a mess of a movie rather than using the force awakens as a springboard for the film the director has decided to have unfunny jokes. \nI doubt i will see the next film as this film decides to put social justice\nin the film and tries to make out that if you don't like the film that you are sexist towards women.
